pages.text: $(li)Sheeps are common passive creatures that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/wool)Wool$(/l) and Raw Mutton upon death.$(br)$(li)They can be bred by giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat)Wheat$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can right click on a Sheep while you are holding $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l) to obtain $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/wool)Wool$(/l).
This animal will regenerate its $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/wool)Wool$(/l) in a few minutes eating $(l)Grass$() on the ground.
